net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class CmsIntegration<PE extends PageElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.component.generator.GeneratorImpl<PE>
      • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.CmsIntegration<PE>
  • Type Parameters:
    PE - the PageElement type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cacheable<PE>, Generator<PE>, Renderer<PE>

    public class CmsIntegration<PE extends PageElement>
extends GeneratorImpl<PE>
    Generator implementation for the purpose of integrating with the CMS internals.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isRequestingCmsIntegrationResponse

        public static boolean isRequestingCmsIntegrationResponse(CmsRequest<?> request)
                                                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Test if the request has the integration key used by this generator and optionally enable or disable live edit mode. This is intended to be called by content negotiation code - PageElement.getNegotiable(PageElementPath) -> Negotiable.negotiateContentType(CmsRequest, List, UserAgent) .
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        Returns:
        true or false. When true, the calling code should ensure the content is negotiated as JSON.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the integration value is invalid.

      • isTarget

        public static boolean isTarget(CmsRequest<?> request)
        Test if the request targets this generator. This is typically called in a PageElement.getGenerator(CmsRequest) method to determine if this generator should be returned. It is used in conjunction with isRequestingCmsIntegrationResponse(CmsRequest).
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • preRenderProcess

        public void preRenderProcess(CmsRequest<PE> request,
                    CmsResponse response,
                    ProcessChain chain)
        Description copied from class: GeneratorImpl
        Process the request. Smart implementations should check to see if anything needs to be done before doing any work.

        This implementation doesn't process child elements. If your implementation requires that functionality, override.

        Specified by:
        preRenderProcess in interface Renderer<PE extends PageElement>
        Overrides:
        preRenderProcess in class GeneratorImpl<PE extends PageElement>
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        chain - the process chain.

          CmsResponse response,
          RenderChain chain)
            throws IOException
        Description copied from class: GeneratorImpl
        Render the response.

        This implementation doesn't process child elements. If your implementation requires that functionality, override.

        Specified by:

        response - the response.
        chain - the render chain.

      • stripLiveEditParameter

        public static String stripLiveEditParameter(String urlOrQuery)
        Strip the live edit parameter from the URL or query component.
        Parameters:
        urlOrQuery - the URL or query component.
        Returns:
        the URL or query component without the CMS Live Edit integration parameter.
